title: [K-12] Anatomy-Clinical Integration Simulation Module

context.prior_knowledge: Basic human anatomy and medical physiology knowledge
context.additional_context: Smartphone-based VR simulation utilization, applying the 5-E instructional model and ARCS motivation theory.

learning_goals: Learners can accurately connect anatomical structures with clinical symptoms by over 80% through 5-E cycle activities.
Learners can reproduce clinical decision-making processes by over 70% through ARCS-based motivational activities in a simulation environment.
Learners can descriptively explain how anatomical knowledge is applied to real medical situations through formative assessments.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
